definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon armor_stand ~0.5 ~0.5 ~0.5 {Tags:["SKYWIZA","SKYWIZA-village","SKYWIZA-village_location"],NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b,Marker:1b,CustomName:'{"text":"</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="block_nbt_text_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">location_name</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">"}'}</field></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute positioned ~0.5 ~0.5 ~0.5 run data modify entity @e[tag=SKYWIZA-village_location,distance=..1,limit=1] ForgeData set from block ~ ~ ~ ForgeData</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
